thread.title: Great hotel... you will be well taken care of -
thread.title_full: Great hotel... you will be well taken care of - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Greg S
title: Great hotel... you will be well taken care of -
text: Very nice boutique hotel in Times Square. Forget the too-big chain hotels. This hotel is top drawer...clean, comfortable and quiet. Enjoy the continental breakfast and the wine and cheese in the afternoon. Only downside is the rooms are pretty small. Front desk staff is extremely helpful.
